snippet.title: Pets for Depression and Health
snippet.description: Having a pet can help improve mild or moderate depression in many people, experts agree, as well as...Could a kitten's purr or a dog's wagging tail help...that you are capable -- that you can do more...

snippet.title: Animal-Assisted Therapy
snippet.description: Dogs and other animals are helping many people through rough and troubled times...comes to man's best friend. But these tender, loving animals can do a lot more than look graceful and pretty -- OK,
